data: Diabetes in Pregnancy Intrapartum (Module)
Patient Care
POC Glucose Whole Blood
q2h, prior to 4 cm dilation and every 1 hour after 4 cm dilation
q1h, after 4 cm dilation
q1h
POC Urinalysis Dipstick Ketones and Proteins
q4h
Continuous Infusions
sodium chloride 0.9% (NS) continuous infusion
order rate: 100 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag order rate: 125 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag
order rate: 50 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag  order rate: 100 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag
order rate: 80 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag    order rate: 50 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag
order rate: 125 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag order rate: 50 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag
dextrose 5%-sodium chloride 0.9% (D5NS) continuous infusion
order rate: 100 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag order rate: 125 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag
order rate: 50 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag  order rate: 100 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag
order rate: 80 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag    order rate: 50 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag
order rate: 125 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag order rate: 50 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag
dextrose 5% (D5W) continuous infusion
order rate: 100 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag order rate: 125 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag
order rate: 50 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag  order rate: 100 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag
order rate: 80 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag    order rate: 50 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag
order rate: 125 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag order rate: 50 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag
dextrose 10% (D10W) continuous infusion
order rate: 100 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag order rate: 125 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag
order rate: 50 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag  order rate: 100 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag
order rate: 80 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag    order rate: 50 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag
order rate: 125 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag order rate: 50 mL/h, IV, drug form: bag
Total Fluid Intake Adult
Including IV fluids, if patient is ordered oxytocin for augmentation or induction reduce the dextrose 5% or dextrose 10% infusion rate to maintain total IV intake at rate specified
Medications
insulin regular - correction scale
Sliding scale, subcutaneous, as directed, PRN hyperglycemia, order duration: 3 day, drug form: inj
insulin lispro - correction scale
Sliding scale, subcutaneous, as directed, PRN hyperglycemia, order duration: 3 day, drug form: inj
Laboratory
Glucose Random
Blood, Routine, Collection: T;N, once
Consults/Referrals
For patients who have type I diabetes, use insulin antepartum, or require more than 20 units of insulin in 24 hours on sliding scale, consider consulting Endocrinology or Internal Medicine
